attributes.action: recognise the same rights for UK pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: whether they live in the UK or elsewhere. A low income UK pensioner living abroad should be able to benefit from exactly the same rights and benefits than the same low income UK pensioner living in the UK. A low income is the same everywhere and the discrimination based on domicile is blatant and utterly unfair.
